channel.title: Jefferson County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Jefferson County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-33 East. Distance to Rexburg, St. Anthony (via US-20 East), and West Yellowstone (Montana via US-20 East).

item.title: ID-33 East at I-15 North
item.description: ID-33 East at I-15 North (Exit 143). Use I-15 North for Butte (Montana). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana).

item.title: ID-33 East at I-15 South
item.description: ID-33 east at I-15 south to Idaho Falls. Continue over overpass for I-15 north onramp to Butte (Montana). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: Exit of Weigh Station at ID-33/I-15 Ramps
item.description: Exit of Sage Junction Weigh Station at ID-33/I-15 Ramps. Turn right for ID-33 West; left for ID-33 East and I-15 onramps (Exit 143). Notice the westbound ID-33 shield is brown, which is an older style of shield denoting a scenic or historic byway. In this case the Sacajawea Historic Byway

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-33 east. Distance to I-15, Rexburg, and West Yellowstone (Montana - via US-20 East)

item.title: ID-33 East - Sacajawea Historic Byway
item.description: Sacajawea Historic Byway on ID-33 east, near Mud Lake.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-28
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-28 north to Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana). This is the southern end of ID-33. The Sacajawea Historic Byway turns from ID-28 to ID-33 east here.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-28
item.description: ID-33 East approaching ID-28 in Jefferson County.

item.title: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20
item.description: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20 in Rigby. Turn right on Bus. US-20 West to Idaho Falls and Pocatello.

item.title: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20
item.description: ID-48 East at Bus. US-20 (State St.) in Rigby. Turn right on Bus. US-20 for Idaho Falls and left on Bus. US-20 for Rexburg. Continue straight on ID-48 for Ririe.

item.title: ID-48 East Approaching Bus. US-20 (State St.)
item.description: ID-48 East Approaching Bus. US-20 (State St.) in Rigby.

item.title: ID-48 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-48 east. Distance to Rigby and Ririe.

item.title: ID-48 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-48 east. Distance to Menan and Rigby.

item.title: ID-48 - Roberts
item.description: ID-48 (N 2880 E) at E 650 N in Roberts. Turn right on E 650 N to continue east on ID-48 towards Menan and Rigby.

item.title: ID-48 West/To I-15 - Roberts
item.description: ID-48 West/To I-15 in Roberts.

item.title: Begin ID-48 East at I-15 North
item.description: Begin ID-48 East at I-15 North in Roberts. Turn left for I-15 north to Butte (Montana); use ID-48 east for Roberts and Rigby.

item.title: I-15 South (Exit 135) at ID-48
item.description: I-15 South (Exit 135) at ID-48 in Roberts. Turn left for Roberts and Rigby; left for Berrett Road.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 135
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 135 - ID-48 South/Roberts/Rigby

item.title: US-20 East - Exit 325
item.description: US-20 east approaching Exit 325 - Menan/Roberts.

item.title: US-20 East - Exit 325
item.description: US-20 east at Exit 325 - Menan/Roberts.

item.title: ID-33 East at I-15 North
item.description: ID-33 East at I-15 North (Exit 143). Use I-15 North for Butte (Montana). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana).

item.title: ID-33 East at I-15 South
item.description: ID-33 east at I-15 south to Idaho Falls. Continue over overpass for I-15 north onramp to Butte (Montana). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East - Sacajawea Historic Byway
item.description: Sacajawea Historic Byway on ID-33 east, near Mud Lake.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-28
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-28 north to Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg and West Yellowstone (Montana). This is the southern end of ID-33. The Sacajawea Historic Byway turns from ID-28 to ID-33 east here.

item.title: I-15 North - Entering Clark County
item.description: Entering Clark County on I-15 north at the Jefferson - Clark County line.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 150
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 150 - Hamer

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 150
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 150 - Hamer

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 143
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 143. Use Exit 143 for Sacajawea Historic Byway.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 143
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 143 - ID-33/Rexburg/Salmon. This is the southern end of the Sacajawea Historic Byway.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 143
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 143 - ID-33/Rexburg/Salmon. This is the southern end of the Sacajawea Historic Byway.

item.description: I-15 north at Exit 135 - ID-48/Roberts

item.description: US-20 east approaching Exit 320, US-20 Bus./To ID-48/Rigby, 1 mile.
